塅字的基本解释

塅
duàn
方言，大片的平地，多用于地名：竹鸡塅（在中国湖南省）。中塅（在中国福建省）。

塅字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duàn］
(1)方言。指面积较大的平坦地区。
(2)用于地名。

塅
Basic explanation of words
塅
duàn
Dialect, a large area of flat land, mostly used for place names: Zhujiyuan (in Hunan Province, China). Zhongyuan (in Fujian Province, China).
塅
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duàn］
(1) Dialects. Refers to a flat area with a larger area.
(2) Used for place names.
